markdown:
**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 557 4.0 **Price** 10,000 gp **Usage** worn armor **Bulk** 4 **Base Armor** [Full Plate](/Armor.aspx?ID=13) --- This suit of _+2 greater resilient [dragonhide](/Equipment.aspx?ID=142) [full plate](/Armor.aspx?ID=13)_ makes you look like a fearsome dragon. The armor comes in 10 varieties corresponding to the 10 common dragon types, though other varieties undoubtedly exist. ## Dragonplate
**Dragon Type****Protects Against****Breath Weapon (Save)**
Black or copperacid30-foot line of acid (Reflex)
Blue or bronzeelectricty30-foot line of electricity (Reflex)
Brassfire30-foot line of fire (Reflex)
Greenpoison15-foot cone of poison (Fortitude)
Gold or redfire15-foot cone of fire (Reflex)
Silver or whitecold15-foot cone of Cold (Reflex)
 **Craft Requirements** The initial raw materials must include 1,250 gp of dragonhide.
name: Dragonplate
